name: Super Galaxy Hockey
description:
Hello this is my submission for notGDCJam 2019 (https://itch.io/jam/notgdcjam2019)

This is a small local co-op air hockey game with a twist! Low gravity and environmental danger?! Then look no further!

Controls

Player One: arrow keys, reset puck Y, cannon fire G, slow mo B.

Player Two: wasd, reset puck T, cannon fire F, slow mo B.

Dead Puck Reset: T + Y

Reset Level: O + P
